qtl2pleio 0.1.2.9000

qtl2pleio

Badges

Goals

The goal of qtl2pleio is to perform a likelihood ratio test that distinguishes between competing hypotheses of presence of two separate QTL (alternative hypothesis) and pleiotropy (null hypothesis) in QTL studies in multiparental populations, such as the Diversity Outbred mouse population. qtl2pleio data structures are those used in the rqtl/qtl2 package.

Installation

install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("fboehm/qtl2pleio")

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:
